K10sf284_sc:1: Wal_1 pṛccha bhagini śrutvā te vedayiṣyāmi /
K10sf284_sc:2: Wal_2 saṁti śramaṇa eke śramaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ ye svayaṁkṛtaṁ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti / saṁty
K10sf284_sc:3: eke parakṛtaṁ prajñapayaṁti saṁty eke svayaṁkṛtaṁ ca parakṛtaṁ ca / saṁty eke ’svayaṁkāra?aparakārahetusamutpannaṁ
K10sf284_sc:4: sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti / yathā kathaṁ samutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:6: Wal_4 yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa anyathāsamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:7: Wal_5 pratītyasamutpannaṁ bhagini arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:8: Wal_6 yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannaṁ arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñpayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:9: Wal_7 tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru /
K10sf284_sc:10: Wal_8 kiṁ manyase bhagini / asti cakṣuḥ / asti śramaṇa / asti rūpam / asti śramaṇa /
K10sf284_sc:11: Wal_9 cakṣuś ced bhagini utpadyeta api nu asti cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā / asti śramaṇa /
K10sf284_sc:12: Wal_10 asti śrotram asti ghāṇam asti jihvā asti kāyaḥ asti manaḥ /
K10sf284_sc:14: Wal_11 asti śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced utpadyeta api nu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
K10sf284_sc:16: Wal_12 evaṁ hi bhagini pratīyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:17: Wal_13 evaṁ hi śramaṇa pratītyasamutpannam arhantaḥ sukhaṁ prajñapya yathā kathaṁ śramaṇa arhantaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:18: Wal_14 tena hi bhagini tvām eva prakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamati tathaitaṁ vyākuru /
K10sf284_sc:19: Wal_15 kiṁ manyase bhagini / cakṣuś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta
K10sf284_sc:20: apariśeṣan adhyastaṁ parikṣayam paryādānaṁ gacched api nu cakṣuḥsaṁsparśapratyayam
K10sf284_sc:21: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
K10sf284_sc:23: Wal_16 śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo manaś ced bhagini sarveṇa sarvaṁ sarvathā apariśeṣaṁ nirudhyeta
K10sf284_sc:24: apariśeṣam adhyastaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gacchet api nu manaḥsaṁsparśapratyayam
K10sf284_sc:25: ādhyātmam utpadyate vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā duḥkhaṁ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṁ vā /
K10sf284_sc:27: Wal_17 evaṁ hi bhagini ārhantaḥ pratītyasamutpannasya sukhaduḥkhasya nirodhaṁ prajñapayaṁti /
K10sf284_sc:28: Wal_18 asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāne veṇukātyāyanasagotryā virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam …
K10sf284_sc:29: Wal_19 atha veṇukātyāyanasagotrī dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
K10sf284_sc:30: tīrṇakāṁkṣā tīrṇavicikitsā aparapratyayā ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśaradyaprāptā
K10sf284_sc:31: utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān udāyī tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya āyuṣmantam
K10sf284_sc:33: Wal_20 abhikrāntāhaṁ śramaṇa abhikrāntā eṣāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ
K10sf284_sc:34: ca / upāsikāṁ ca mān dhāraya śramaṇa adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇaṁgatām abhiprasannām /
K10sf284_sc:35: Wal_21 atha udāyī veṇukātyāyanasagotrīṁ brāhmaṇīṁ dhārmyā kathayāsaṁdarśayitvā samādapayitvā samuttejayitvā saṁpraharṣayitvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
